quotes.text: The way to get started is to quit talking and start doing
quotes.author: Walt Disney

quotes.text: Don't sit down and wait for the opportunities to come. Get up and make them
quotes.author: Madam C.J. Walker

quotes.text: Nothing will work unless you do
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.text: If you spend too much time thinking about a thing, you'll never get it done
quotes.author: Bruce Lee

quotes.text: Action is the foundational key to all success
quotes.author: Pablo Picasso

quotes.text: Success is the sum of small efforts, repeated day in and day out
quotes.author: Robert Collier

quotes.text: With ordinary talent and extraordinary perseverance, all things are attainable
quotes.author: Thomas Fowell Buxton

quotes.text: The man who moves a mountain begins by carrying away small stones
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.text: It does not matter how slowly you go as long as you do not stop
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.text: Great things are done by a series of small things brought together
quotes.author: Vincent van Gogh

quotes.text: You've got to get up every morning with determination if you're going to go to bed with satisfaction
quotes.author: George Lorimer

quotes.text: Don't count the days, make the days count
quotes.author: Muhammad Ali

quotes.text: Someday is not a day of the week
quotes.author: Janet Dailey

quotes.text: The secret of getting ahead is getting started
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.text: Even if you're on the right track, you'll get run over if you just sit there
quotes.author: Will Rogers

quotes.text: Concentrate all your thoughts upon the work in hand
quotes.author: Alexander Graham Bell

quotes.text: Focus means eliminating distractions, not just from other people, but the things we do to distract ourselves
quotes.author: Catherine Pulsifer

quotes.text: Amateurs sit and wait for inspiration, the rest of us just get up and go to work
quotes.author: Stephen King

quotes.text: Productivity is never an accident
quotes.author: Paul J. Meyer

quotes.text: Our daily decisions and habits have a huge impact upon both our levels of happiness and success
quotes.author: Shawn Achor

quotes.text: Lost time is never found again
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.text: You've gotta keep control of your time
quotes.author: Warren Buffet

quotes.text: Never do tomorrow what you can do today
quotes.author: Charles Dickens

quotes.text: Time is the most valuable coin in your life
quotes.author: Carl Sandburg

quotes.text: Yesterday is gone. Tomorrow has not yet come. We have only today
quotes.author: Mother Teresa

quotes.text: Start where you are. Use what you have. Do what you can
quotes.author: Arthur Ashe

quotes.text: The only way to do great work is to love what you do
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.text: Don't be busy; be productive
quotes.author: Tony Robbins

quotes.text: Make each day your masterpiece
quotes.author: John Wooden

quotes.text: What you do today can improve all your tomorrows
quotes.author: Ralph Marston

quotes.text: Victory is always possible for the person who refuses to stop fighting
quotes.author: Napoleon Hill

quotes.text: Things may come to those who wait, but only the things left by those who hustle
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.text: Opportunity is missed by most people because it is dressed in overalls and looks like work
quotes.author: Thomas Edison

quotes.text: The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.text: Without ambition one starts nothing. Without work one finishes nothing
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.text: You cannot escape the responsibility of tomorrow by evading it today
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.text: If you really want to do something, you'll find a way
quotes.author: Jim Rohn

quotes.text: The harder I work, the more luck I seem to have
quotes.author: Thomas Jefferson

quotes.text: Good things happen to those who hustle
quotes.author: Anais Nin

quotes.text: All progress takes place outside the comfort zone
quotes.author: Michael John Bobak

quotes.text: We are what we repeatedly do. Excellence, then, is not an act, but a habit
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.text: Do what you can, where you are, with what you have
quotes.author: Teddy Roosevelt

quotes.text: Your success and happiness lies in you
quotes.author: Helen Keller

quotes.text: The quality of a person's life is in direct proportion to their commitment to excellence
quotes.author: Vince Lombardi

quotes.text: Doing the best at this moment puts you in the best place for the next moment
quotes.author: Oprah Winfrey

quotes.text: It always seems impossible until it's done
quotes.author: Nelson Mandela

quotes.text: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: it is the courage to continue that counts
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.text: The only way to achieve the impossible is to believe it is possible
quotes.author: Charles Kingsleigh

quotes.text: Keep going. Each step may get harder, but don't stop
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: Energy and persistence conquer all things
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin
